EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners (1387556650.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners (1387556650.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Larry, It was a pleasure speaking with you today! I wanted to pass along the information that we talked about: - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - We have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here. <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources/all> - You can sign up for Zintro here http://www.zintro.com/home <http://www.zintro.com/home>. This will help you connect with clients looking for your Subject Matter Expertise. - You can review our “Independent’s Guide” by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> I think you will find this very helpful in the planning stages of branching off and into the consulting world. I will also send you the new client letter which you can send to a prospective client to help them better understand what we do. I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule by going here. <https://my.timedriver.com/Y3NJC> Happy Holidays! ___________________Meghan MoulConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6359f: 703.793.6473e: mmoul@mbopartners.com <mailto:mmoul@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=moul> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them.
